channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Substance3D - Painter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Substance3D - Painter

item.title: CVE-2024-20740|2024-08-16T18:41:46.489Z -- adobe -- substance3d%20-%20painter
item.description: Substance3D - Painter versions 9.1.1 and earlier are affected by an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-30274|2024-06-04T17:39:14.525Z -- adobe -- substance3d%20-%20painter
item.description: Substance3D - Painter versions 9.1.2 and earlier are affected by an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-30308|2024-06-06T16:13:37.474Z -- adobe -- substance3d%20-%20painter
item.description: Substance3D - Painter versions 9.1.2 and earlier Answer: are affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could lead to disclosure of sensitive memory. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to bypass mitigations such as ASLR. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
